ANOTHER VICTORY: #EqualPayForEqualWork just passed the House – with our amendment included! Our amendment makes sure that all women, especially women of color, aren’t being left behind. pic.twitter.com/VSBc5ks2Yd

Equal work deserves equal pay. This isn’t just an equality issue, it’s an economics issue. Women are half our workforce, and the Paycheck Fairness Act will cut the number of women in poverty by half. pic.twitter.com/KJhjBtGxKq

Earlier this week I spoke with higher education experts about the skyrocketing cost of college. As families across the Central Valley choose whether or not to pursue college, my new bill works to make the process more transparent. pic.twitter.com/rpn9S1CthR

Sending a child to college is one of the most important, expensive, and least transparent decisions a family can make. Today I introduced the College Transparency Act, a bill that’s a first step in dealing with the student debt crisis. 

 http://harder.house.gov/media/press-releases/harder-introduces-bipartisan-legislation-help-students-succeed … pic.twitter.com/Bg1ZRA5oN0

Pam & I are heartbroken to hear about the horrific acts of violence in New Zealand. We must condemn all acts of terror & reject all forms of hatred. Thank you to all first responders in Christchurch & my heart goes out to the families who lost loved ones in this act of brutality.

One of the most important tasks I’ve had the past few months is building a team 100% dedicated to serving the Central Valley. Read here to see why we couldn’t be more lucky to have Karen leading the charge. https://www.oakdaleleader.com/news/warner-earns-key-post-congressional-team/ …

The Administration’s proposed budget will devastate our family farms. Central Valley farmers need support, not billions of dollars in cuts. pic.twitter.com/FnGAPbVWmk

Corporate dark money + politicians = a Congress that doesn’t help our communities. It’s time to break the hold that special interests have on Congress. I’m ready to roll up my sleeves and make some real progress for Central Valley families. pic.twitter.com/hKt2xFbAsD

We heard from Valley veterans that staffing shortages at the VA make it harder for them to get care, so we did something about it. Today, our bipartisan bill passed the House which increases the VA’s recruitment pool & teaches future doctors about challenges our veterans face. pic.twitter.com/CvUyhkrApL

What is H.R.1? It’s our anti-corruption bill that will:
✅ Get dark money out of politics
✅ End partisan gerrymandering
✅ Protect our elections from foreign influence
